column5: Just a heads up that Dave Mercer is on BT Channel 803 on Bell this am.
I talk to my bobber`s too Dave but I don`t eat worms!!!
Doesn't he know that earth worms can grow to 12 feet long in an acidic environment?
just caught the end of it when he ate a worn. I thought he would have been a little more taller
missed it but that picture says a million words, thats for sure! funny guy..
That's because everybody is used to seeing him standing beside me on the show and I'm only 5'6" on a good day!  Cheers, Ryan
you won't want to stand by me then. I'm 6'3
